entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3 except zero south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Rain except snow south of Hare Bay. Amount 10 mm north of Hare Bay. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 late this afternoon. High plus 3 except zero south of Hare Bay. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
